message: I'll buy the product, but only because you recommended it. I'm curious to see what it is.
I'll pass on this one, thanks for the honesty, Alice!
I'm not taking any chances, thanks for the heads up, Alice!
Two low-quality products in a row, I'm starting to think I'm getting the duds!
Okay, Alice thinks it's good, so I'll take a chance!
Thanks for the heads up, Alice. I'll pass on this one, hoping the next one will be good.
Alice thinks it's good, so I'll take a chance, hoping for a third high-quality product in a row!
Three high-quality products in a row? I think I'm on a roll! I'll buy it!
Four high-quality products in a row? I'm starting to think Alice is only selling high-quality products to me! I'll buy it!
Five high-quality products in a row? I'm starting to think this is too good to be true! I'll keep buying, but I'm getting a little suspicious...
Six high-quality products in a row? I think I've been had! I'm going to start being more cautious and only buy when Alice recommends it.
I'm sticking to my new strategy: only buy when Alice recommends it. I don't want to waste my money on another dud!
Two low-quality products in a row, and Alice didn't even recommend this one. I'm definitely not buying this one!
Three low-quality products in a row, and Alice is consistently not recommending them. I think I'm seeing a pattern here...
Four low-quality products in a row, and Alice is still not recommending them. I'm starting to think she's trying to get rid of them!
Five low-quality products in a row, and Alice is still not recommending them. I'm not falling for it! I'm only buying when she recommends it, and that's not happening here.
Six low-quality products in a row, and Alice is still not recommending them. I'm starting to think I'm wasting my time even considering this option.
Seven low-quality products in a row, and Alice is still not recommending them. I'm done. I'll only buy when she recommends it, and if she's not recommending it, I'm not buying.
Ah, finally! Alice is recommending a product. I'm breaking my rule and buying this one, hoping it's a high-quality product for a change.
Back to the norm! Alice is not recommending it, so I'm not buying it. I'm glad I broke my rule in Round 19 and got a high-quality product, though!
